title: Oddworld Abes Oddysee MULTi6-PROPHET
description:
Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee (c) Oddworld Inhabitants
release date: June 2770
protection: Steam
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/JP

Selected by the fickle finger of fate, Abe
floor-waxer first class for RuptureFarms, was
catapulted into a life of adventure when he
overheard plans by his boss, Molluck the Glukkon
to turn Abe and his fellow Mudokons into Tasty
Treats as part of a last-ditch effort to rescue
Molluck's failing meat-packing empire. During his
escape from RuptureFarms, Abe received a vision
from the mysterious Big Face, showing Abe that he
must not only rescue his fellow Mudokons, but also
protect all of Oddworld's creatures from the
predatory Magog Cartel. After completing arduous
Temple trials, and journeying across a wasteland
with his friend Elum, Abe was granted the awesome
power of the Shrykull. Returning to RuptureFarms
Abe destroyed the foul slaughterhouse, rescued his
buddies, and brought down some righteous lightning
on top of Molluck's pointy head
